nhc_headline: ...DEBBY LOITERING OFF THE SOUTH CAROLINA COAST... ...MAJOR FLOOD THREAT CONTINUES FOR PORTIONS OF THE CAROLINAS...
summary:
...DEBBY LOITERING OFF THE SOUTH CAROLINA COAST... ...MAJOR FLOOD THREAT CONTINUES FOR PORTIONS OF THE CAROLINAS...
 As of 5:00 AM EDT Wed Aug 7
 the center of Debby was located near 31.9, -79.5
 with movement E at 5 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 995 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.
